article.headline: Holy Cross 73, Boston U. 70 OT
article.story: BOSTON (AP)(AP) -- Keith Simmons scored three free throws in the final minute of overtime Wednesday night, leading Holy Cross to a 73-70 victory over Boston University. Simmons, who finished with 21 points and 11 rebounds, made 1-of-2 from the line to tie the game, 69-69, with 55.5 seconds left. He then stole a BU pass and was fouled, converting two free throws with 37.3 left on the clock to put his team ahead for good. Greg McCarthy, who came into the game when Tim Clifford fouled out in the overtime, made two free throws (his only points of the game) with 13.7 seconds remaining to make it 73-70 and BU had a shot to force a second overtime, but Corey Lowe missed a 3-pointer in the closing seconds. Lowe, who had a game-high 24 points, missed three of eight free throw attempts in overtime. His miss on his second try at 15.6 seconds set up the McCarthy free throws. Tyler Morris, who forced the OT with a 28-foot buzzer shot at the end of regulation, had 23 for the Terriers, but didn't score in the OT. Officials conferred for five minutes, looking at replays, before allowing the Morris basket and sending the game to overtime. Clifford and Torey Thomas each had 16 points for Holy Cross. The win lifted Holy Cross, which has played 10 straight games away from home, to 9-6. BU (3-9) lost its fifth straight, 0-4 at home.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
